body.name: Baby Wipes, Unscented, Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance-Free Baby Diaper Wipes, 6 Flip-Top Packs (384 Wipes Total),64 Count (Pack of 6)
features: 6 flip-top packs of 64 unscented baby wipes (384 wipes total); Family Wipes – Great for hands, faces, bottoms & everyday surfaces with a gentle & reliable clean for the whole family
Grab & Go – Cleans messes here, there, and everywhere; take these unscented baby diaper wipes wherever you take messes
No Harsh Ingredients – Free of lotions, fragrances, parabens, alcohol & dyes, and elemental chlorine; does not contain MIT or phenoxyethanol
pH Balanced – Hypoallergenic, dermatologically tested & pH balanced to help maintain healthy skin
Simply Clean Wipes are available in fragrance-free and fresh scent varieties; Plant-based wipes since 1990; packaging may vary from image shown
body.description: Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance Free Baby Wipes are a great combination of convenience and versatility, a must have for the entire family. They're great for sensitive baby bottoms, but can also be used to wipe hands, faces and surfaces for toddlers & children. Simply Clean unscented wipes are a great solution wherever you go, whether it's around the house, at the playground or in the car. Because kids outgrow diapers, not messes. Simply Clean baby wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologically tested & pH-balanced to help maintain healthy skin. They're also fragrance free, alcohol free, paraben free and do not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT. Huggies Simply Clean Wipes are available in scented and unscented options. Join Huggies Rewards+ Powered by Fetch to get rewarded fast. Earn points on Huggies diapers and wipes, in addition to thousands of other products to redeem for hundreds of gift cards. Download the Fetch Rewards app to get started today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Because kids outgrow diapers, not messes Adventures can get messy. These versatile wipes clean up faces, hands, bottoms, and even surfaces. Everything’s more fun with a little Disney Magic You’re pretty magical, baby, and Simply Clean Wipes let you keep a magical Disney pal by your side. An unscented wipe you can always count on When you need an unscented baby wipe that can go anywhere and clean anything, we got you, baby. Use these wipes here, there, everywhere Take Huggies Simply Clean wherever you go, whether it's around the house, the playground or the car. Hypoallergenic & mild enough for sensitive skin Our fragrance free wipes can help keep your skin healthy, baby, without any harsh ingredients. Next page 1 Versatile Clean 2 Disney Designs 3 Fragrance Free 4 A Great Solution 5 Hypoallergenic

We got you, baby. Wipes and diapers. Mom and snuggles. Mac and cheese. These classic duos are always better together, baby! Pair up your wipes with Huggies Snug & Dry Baby Diapers, the perfect diapering duo with 12 hours of leak protection

Huggies is proud to sponsor Hand to Hold Some of our happiest moments happen during hard times. That’s why Huggies helps with free virtual services to families before, during, & after being in the NICU.

What makes Huggies Simply Clean Baby Wipes right for you, baby? Messes can happen anywhere, baby. Huggies Simply Clean Wipes are sturdy enough for tough messes and gentle enough for your sensitive skin. Can these wipes take care of messes on my face & hands too? Exploring the world gets messy, baby. Our Simply Clean Fragrance Free Wipes are versatile and durable for giving a gentle clean wherever you need it. You might be wondering, baby — are these wipes scented? Skin can be a little sensitive, baby. Huggies Simply Clean Fragrance Free Wipes are hypoallergenic, fragrance- & lotion-free, and free of parabens and dyes. If you want a delicate scent, try our Natural Care Refreshing Wipes or Nourish & Care Wipes. Are these wipes easy to grab one-handed? Mom’s got her hands full, baby. But don’t worry, our baby wipes have EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing so it’s easy to grab just one wipe at a time without wasting sheets. Using the toilet is an important lesson to learn, baby, but are Huggies Wipes flushable? Designed for cushiony softness and durability, Huggies baby wipes don't easily break down after flushing. Please don’t flush baby wipes, and instead use the trash bin for your wipes and diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great deal! We send these to our daughters daycare. The value pack is such a great deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Love these wipes. Box came sealed soft texture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, especially for one handed pulls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal and easy to get!
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are a great deal and separate easy! An important part of daily changes for baby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's A Gamble
reviews.reviewText: The first time, I got an actual box and those were great, exactly what I wanted.The second time I recieved 6 packs in a sealed bag and in each pack, the wipes were almost completely dry.So, I guess you have to decide if it's worth the gamble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horribleeeeeee never again
reviews.reviewText: Wow I’ve been getting the boxes for these wipes but I ran out so I ordered a smaller one, they were so bad. Each one that I opened were dry. I had to add water to them. I had no choice but to use them because I literally had none. Do yourself a favor and order the full box and not these individuals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They come in dry
reviews.reviewText: They were dry I tried to return them and it wouldn’t let me

They were so very handy when I had my kids 32 + years ago, that I have been purchasing them regularly since. I use them in the bathroom, quick face wash, sticky hands EVERYTHING…and will continue to use them.
Not bad for the price but they are very soapy feeling
